Topic.Title: play not working on desktop quest editor

Posts.EditableText: I've been working on the online version of the quest editor before deciding to switch to the desktop version. I was able to play the game no problem on the online version, but on the desktop version, it doesn't work at all. None of the links work, no commands or input, the compass does nothing. It just loads the first page and ignores all input. I haven't changed anything between switching. Is this a known problem? How do I fix it?
Posts.HTML: I've been working on the online version of the quest editor before deciding to switch to the desktop version. I was able to play the game no problem on the online version, but on the desktop version, it doesn't work at all. None of the links work, no commands or input, the compass does nothing. It just loads the first page and ignores all input. I haven't changed anything between switching. Is this a known problem? How do I fix it?
